alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 11:55AM EST until January 04 at 7:56PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rolling Fork River near Boston affecting Hardin and Nelson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rolling Fork River near Boston. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Agricultural bottomland is covered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 35.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM EST Tuesday was 38.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 10.4 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued later this evening...
